name: Golden Wolflord
desc:
"King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord

A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.

customize.name: Golden Wolflord
customize.desc:
"King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord

A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Golden Wolflord's Circling

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "Feline legend meows of an island across the sea, shrouded in fog and mystery. It has even been meowed that a big, scary golden wolf circles in the sky above..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Golden Wolflord" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Beastly Corrosion" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Golden Wolflord's Constriction

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Though that huge golden wolf may indeed be called a wolf, yet it displays an uncannily serpent-like flexibility. As it circles above its prey, even the most alert of cats would start to feel dizzy from watching it..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Golden Wolflord" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Beastly Corrosion" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Golden Wolflord

value.name: Golden Wolflord
value.desc:
Hailing from a dark world, this ruler of the black wolves has the power to call upon its followers, its hidden claws, to dissolve space itself and forge a rift through which it may enter.
The Wolflord has no name, for it was but one of "Gold"'s unintentional creations, and that is precisely why it is obsessed with invading worlds that do not belong to it and making a name for itself.
That said, the wolf pack is far from unintelligent. After suffering a defeat in its previous invasion, a deserted island where no humans or protectors dwell has been selected for them to prepare for their lord's descent.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , attaches 2 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Golden Corrosion</color> to target character, and summons <color=#ffffff>Rifthound Skull</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Golden Corrosion</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> If the character to which this is attached is on standby, then that character will take 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> that this effect has.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby, then attaches <color=#ffffff>Golden Corrosion</color> to all opposing characters.
<color=#ece5d8>Golden Corrosion</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> If the character to which this is attached is on standby, then that character will take 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> that this effect has.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . Attach <color=#ffffff>Golden Corrosion</color> to target character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
